item.title: I got a bit of a problem
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

ok so i added the ::nick command to my server and its becomming a problem becuz when i used it on my co-owner (::nick x cheese x) i wound up taking her account, like her pass changed to mine and i don’t want that happening in case one of my admins decide to nick a normal player then they will lose their account and when i recofver it for them it’ll have the admins rights, bank, equpment, etc… does any one have a different nick command?

here is mine

            	} else if (command.startsWith("nick")
                    	&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Glabay")) {
                	try {
                   	playerName = command.substring(5);
                    	updateRequired = true;
                    	appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                	} catch (Exception e) {
                    	sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::nick [NEWNAME]");
                	}
